get.summary: Get general blockchain information
Get node configuration information
Get node crypto configuration information
Get node fee statistics
Get node status information
Get node sync status information
See node peer status information

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The node version by which the resources will be filtered

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single peer by its IP address

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address of the peer

get.summary: List blocks or search for blocks meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the block to be returned

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: previousBlock
parameters.description: Previous block ID chained to the block to be returned

parameters.name: payloadHash
parameters.description: Hash of the transaction payload of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: generatorPublicKey
parameters.description: Public key of the delegate that forged the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blockSignature
parameters.description: Signature of the block to be returned

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Exact height of the block to be returned

parameters.name: height.from
parameters.description: Earliest height of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: height.to
parameters.description: Latest height of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions
parameters.description: Exact number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: numberOfTransactions.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions inside the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalAmount.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: totalFee.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the fees of all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the fees that were burned in all transactions in the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward
parameters.description: Exact block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward.from
parameters.description: Lowest block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: reward.to
parameters.description: Highest block reward amount of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength
parameters.description: Exact transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength.from
parameters.description: Minimum transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: payloadLength.to
parameters.description: Maximum transaction payload length of the block(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single block by its ID or height

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: ID or height of block to return

get.summary: Get the most recent block in the blockchain
Find transactions in a specific block

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: ID or height of block to get transactions

get.summary: List delegates or search for delegates meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the delegate to be returned

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the delegate to be returned

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the delegate to be returned

parameters.name: isResigned
parameters.description: Whether the delegate(s) to be returned are resigned and no longer able to forge

parameters.name: production.approval
parameters.description: Exact production approval rate of the delegate(s) to be returned

parameters.name: production.approval.from
parameters.description: Lowest production approval rate of the delegate(s) to be returned

parameters.name: production.approval.to
parameters.description: Highest production approval rate of the delegate(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.fees
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all fees forged by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.fees.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all fees forged by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.fees.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all fees forged by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.burnedFees
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.burnedFees.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.burnedFees.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all fees burned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.rewards
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.rewards.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.rewards.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.total
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.total.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: forged.total.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of all unburned fees plus block rewards earned by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votes
parameters.description: Exact amount of vote weight for the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votes.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount of vote weight for the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: votes.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount of vote weight for the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced
parameters.description: Exact number of blocks produced by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced.from
parameters.description: Minimum number of blocks produced by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blocks.produced.to
parameters.description: Maximum number of blocks produced by the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: rank
parameters.description: Exact rank of the delegate to be returned

parameters.name: rank.from
parameters.description: Lowest rank of the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: rank.to
parameters.description: Highest rank of the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Exact node version running on the delegate(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version.from
parameters.description: Earliest node version running on the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: version.to
parameters.description: Latest node version running on the delegates(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single delegate by its identifier

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier for delegate (address, public key, username)

get.summary: Find blocks produced by a specific delegate

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier for delegate (address, public key, username)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

get.summary: Find wallets currently voting for a specific delegate

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier for delegate (address, public key, username)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

get.summary: List HTLC transaction locks or search for locks meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: lockId
parameters.description: The lock id to be returned

parameters.name: senderPublicKey
parameters.description: Public key of the sender of the lock(s) to be returned

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: Address of the recipient of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: secretHash
parameters.description: Secret hash string of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vendorField
parameters.description: Vendor field string of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: isExpired
parameters.description: Whether the lock(s) to be returned have expired

parameters.name: expirationType
parameters.description: Expiration type (1 = timestamp, 2 = height) of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: expirationValue
parameters.description: Exact expiration time or height of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: expirationValue.from
parameters.description: Earliest expiration time or height of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: expirationValue.to
parameters.description: Latest expiration time or height of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.epoch
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.epoch.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.epoch.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.unix
parameters.description: Exact time, in UNIX timestamp format, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.unix.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in UNIX timestamp format, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.unix.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in UNIX timestamp format, of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.human
parameters.description: Exact time, in RFC 3339 human readable format (e.g. 2022-03-28T18:00:00.000Z), of the lock transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

get.summary: Find a single HTLC transaction lock by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Lock ID

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

requestBody.description: An ids object containing an array of lock IDs

get.summary: Get delegate public keys forging in a specific round

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The forging round number to retrieve the public keys of delegates

get.summary: List transactions or search for transactions meeting specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page that will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The transaction id to be returned

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: typeGroup
parameters.description: The type group of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: blockId
parameters.description: The block ID containing the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: senderPublicKey
parameters.description: Public key of the sender of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: senderId
parameters.description: Address of the sender of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: Address of the recipient of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: vendorField
parameters.description: Vendor field string of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Exact amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.from
parameters.description: Minimum amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: amount.to
parameters.description: Maximum amount, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Exact fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee.from
parameters.description: Minimum fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: fee.to
parameters.description: Maximum fee, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee
parameters.description: Exact fee amount that was burned, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee.from
parameters.description: Minimum fee amount that was burned, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: burnedFee.to
parameters.description: Maximum fee amount that was burned, in satoshis, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Exact time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.from
parameters.description: Earliest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: timestamp.to
parameters.description: Latest time, in seconds since the epoch, of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Exact nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce.from
parameters.description: Minimum nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: nonce.to
parameters.description: Maximum nonce of the transaction(s) to be returned

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method

requestBody.description: A transactions object containing an array of signed transactions
